question: Using a Punnett square, predict the genotypic and phenotypic ratios of a cross between two heterozygous tall pea plants (Tt).

sample_answer.full_answer:
The Punnett square for a cross between two heterozygous tall pea plants (Tt) would be: | T | t
---|---|---
T | TT | Tt
t | Tt | tt
(2 marks)
The genotypic ratio would be 1 TT : 2 Tt : 1 tt (1 mark).
The phenotypic ratio would be 3 tall : 1 short (1 mark).
